text: This is a list of national anthems by the language(s) they are most commonly sung in. == Arabic == Country Anthem Kassaman Bahrainona Udzima wa ya Masiwa Mawtini Fida'i Aash Al-Maleek Ishy Bilady == English == Country Anthem O Canada The Star-Spangled Banner God Save the King High We Exalt Thee, Realm of the Free All Hail, Liberia, Hail! Arise, O Compatriots South Sudan Oyee! Stand and Sing of Zambia, Proud and Free Namibia, Land of the Brave Advance Australia Fair == French == Country Anthem La Marseillaise La Congolaise Debout Congolais La Concorde La Dessalinienne ==German== Country Anthem Land der Berge Deutschlandlied Oben am jungen Rhein Schweizerpsalm == Indonesian == Country Anthem Indonesia Raya ==Italian== Country Anthem Il Canto degli Italiani Inno Nazionale della Repubblica Inno e Marcia Pontificale ==Malay== Country Anthem Allah Peliharakan Sultan Negaraku Majulah Singapura ==Portuguese== Country Anthem Angola Avante Hino Nacional Brasileiro Cântico da Liberdade Pátria Esta É a Nostra Pátria Ben Amada Pátria Amada A Portuguesa Independência total ==Romanian== Country Anthem Limba Noastră (Лимба ноастрэ) Deșteaptă-te Române == Serbo-Croatian == Country Anthem National anthem of Croatia Bože Pravde ==Somali== Country Anthem Djibouti Qolobaa Calankeed == Spanish == Country Anthem Himno Nacional Argentino National Anthem of Colombia Himno Nacional Mexicano ==Swahili== Country Anthem Ee Mungu Nguvu Yetu Mungu Ibariki Afrika ==More than one language== Below are anthems that are sung in more than one language most of the time. It does not include countries like Canada, Finland or Switzerland, where the national anthem has official lyrics in many languages but is only sung in one most of the time. Country Anthem Languages God Defend New Zealand Māori, English Nkosi Sikelel’ iAfrica Xhosa, Zulu, Sesotho, Afrikaans, English God zij met ons Suriname Dutch, Sranan Tongo La Brabançonne French, German, Dutch ==Related pages== * List of national anthems * List of regional anthems ==References== ===Notes=== *
title: List of national anthems by language
